# Viginere_Cipher_Encryption

This repository includes the Implementation of Kerchoff's method Vigenere Cipher (Decryption), thi was one of the projects for my Data Security and Cryptography Course. The code results number of co-incidences with corresponding shifts in descending order.

The Decrypted Ciphertext:


Decryption Key:

HEATRSK
